text: yastaftunaka quli l-lahu yuf'tikum fi l-kalalati ini im'ru-on halaka laysa lahu waladun walahu ukh'tun falaha nis'fu ma taraka wahuwa yarithuha in lam yakun laha waladun fa-in kanata ith'natayni falahuma l-thuluthani mimma taraka wa-in kanu ikh'watan rijalan wanisaan falildhakari mith'lu hazzi l-unthayayni yubayyinu l-lahu lakum an tadillu wal-lahu bikulli shayin Ê¿alimun
